title: IBBI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Assistant Manager, Assistant General Manager Posts
description: The Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Assistant Manager, Assistant General Manager Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBA and Post-graduate can apply for the IBBI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
